HAVE THE FOLLOWING SPOKEN, WRITTEN AND READING (LITERACY) LEVELS..
High literacy: Speaks reads and writes, in Native language
Medium literacy: Speaks and reads, in Native Language (can not write)
No literacy: Speaks in Native Language (can not read & write)
High literacy: Speaks reads and writes, in Non Native language(s) offered in program
Medium literacy: Speaks and reads, in in Non Native language(s) offered in program (can not write)
Low literacy: Speaks in Non Native language(s) offered in program (can not read & write)

FSP: Please list the FSP company names and links used by the people affected in the program area.

FSP: What is your chosen FSP's Know Your Customer (KYC) policies / regulations that need to be met? Read more here https://www.calpnetwork.org/publication/know-your-customer-standards-and-privacy-recommendations-for-cash-transfers/
FSP: What are the service costs asked by the chosen FSP?  For example they may charge per transfer or per month Please note this may increase your budget needs!
FSP: Will your chosen FSP or their agents, guarantee there will be enough cash available at time of distribution?
